entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
